content.text: John Cena was born West Newbury, Massachusetts.
Cena doesn't speak often about his religion or political views, but he lists himself as Catholic on his Myspace page.

content.sourceTitle: John Cena On Linda McMahon's Senate Campaign
content.text: Politically, Cena has endorsed Republican Connecticut Senate candidate Linda McMahon
